mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(PRO_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS proDate, COUNT(*) AS completedCount FROM projects WHERE pro_status = 4 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PRO_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY proDate
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WORKS WHERE CASE WHEN REGEXP_LIKE(WORK_ENDDATE, '^\d{4}\d{2}\d{2}$') THEN TO_DATE(WORK_ENDDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') END < SYSDATE AND WORK_STATUS != 3

SELECT employee.emp_name, COUNT(*) AS managerCount FROM works JOIN manager ON works.work_no = manager.work_no JOIN employee ON manager.emp_no = employee.emp_no WHERE works.work_status IN (1, 2, 4) GROUP BY employee.emp_name

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(work_enddate, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS workDate, COUNT(*) AS completedCount FROM works WHERE work_status = 3 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(work_enddate, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY workDate
